author: Liu, ZB
adress: Soochow Univ, Zhangjiagang Hosp, Dept Orthoped, Suzhou, Jiangsu, Peoples R China
title: A Novel Approach for Imaging of Thoracic Outlet Syndrome Using Contrast-Enhanced Magnetic Resonance Angiography (CE-MRA), Short Inversion Time Inversion Recovery Sampling Perfection with Application-Optimized Contrasts Using Different Flip Angle Evolutions (T2-STIR-SPACE), and Volumetric Interpolated Breath-Hold Examination (VIBE)
